GV06avpray_u:2.9.94_7-11_1: japtvā yathārthaṃ kuryād yathārthaṃ kuryāt || 9 || iti yajñaprāyāścitte dvitīyo 'dhyāyah samāptaḥ || [ed. purastad]
GV06avpray_u:3.1.94_13-15: brahmavrate savitā saṃdhīyamāne 'ndho 'cheto divyaḥ suparṇaḥ parikhyāto
GV06avpray_u:3.3.95-96_21-1: nibhūyapurādhāvanīye supūtaḥ pūtabhṛti suśukraśrīr manthaśrīḥ saktuśrīḥ kṣīraśrīḥ kakubhaḥ pātreṣu |
GV06avpray_u:3.3.96_14: ādityā anuyājeṣu | yad antarā kriyate sa samudro |
GV06avpray_u:3.3.96_16: yat pare tad udayanīyaṃ | vaiṣṇavo vaśāyāṃ |
GV06avpray_u:3.4.96_17-19: yasyā yasyāntataḥ somo vyāpadyeta tasyai tasyai devatāyā iṣṭiṃ nirvaped ājyahomān vā |
GV06avpray_u:3.4.96_20-21: tvāṃ yajño viṣṇur yajñaviṣṇū anūnaṃ hitvā ātmānaṃ deveṣu vidayāmīti |
GV06avpray_u:3.4.96_21-23: vanaspate 'ntataḥ syānuṣṭubhaṃ chandaso yaṃ tam abhyukta etena saṃdadhāmīti saṃdhāya <yan me skannam [see above]> iti skanne |
GV06avpray_u:3.4.96-97_24-1: <yad asmṛti [PS 20.8.9, ;SS 7.106.1]>_iti ca karmaviparyāseti ca tad <yad ṛkta oṃ bhūr janad [cf. GB 1.3.3e]> iti gārhapatye juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.4.97_1-2: yadi yajuṣṭa oṃ bhuvo janad iti dakṣiṇāgnau juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.4.97_3: yadi sāmata oṃ svar janad ity āhavanīye juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.4.97_4-5: yady atharvata oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svar janad om ity āhavanīya eva juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.4.97_7: tasya ha vā agnir hotāsīt | vāyur adhvaryuḥ |
GV06avpray_u:3.4.97_10-12: āditya jyotir āpo 'tharvaṇām āyatanaṃ candramā jyotir iti ca || 4 ||
GV06avpray_u:3.5.97_12-15: atha yad avocāmāpattau somaṃ ceti yajamānaṃ ced rājānaṃ stena ha vā prathamaś cāhareyuś cittavyāpatyur vā bhavet | ity āhāśmarathyaḥ |
GV06avpray_u:3.5.97_15-17: yadaiva karmābhyadhvaryur vihitas tadaiva sarvakratūn praty āpado vihitāḥ ity āhur ācāryāḥ |
GV06avpray_u:3.5.97_18-19: upacārabhakṣapratiś cety adhvaryur asya yajamānakarmāṇi kuryāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.5.97_19-21: atra yajamānāsane mārjālīye vā camasau nidhāya tatrāsya bhakṣakāle bhakṣāṇy upasthāpayeyur ā samiṣṭayajuṣo homāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.5.97-98_21-2: prāk samiṣṭayajur homāc ced yajamāna āgacchet samastān eva bhakṣajapān japtvā bhakṣayec cheṣaṃ |
GV06avpray_u:3.6.98_3-4: atha ha yaṃ jīvan na śrutipathaṃ gachet kiyantam asya kālam agnihotraṃ juhuyur |
GV06avpray_u:3.6.98_4-7: yady eva hitam āyus tasyāśeṣaṃ prasaṃkhyā[ya] tāvantaṃ kālaṃ tad asyāgnihotraṃ hutvāthāsya prāyaṇīyena pracareyur |
GV06avpray_u:3.6.98_8-9: sa cej jīvann āgachet kathaṃ vā proṣyāgatāya yathākāryaṃ karmāṇi kuryāt [ed. karṃāṇi]
GV06avpray_u:3.6.98_9-11: sa cet svayamuttha[ḥ] syād punar asyāgnīn ādhāyādbhutāni vācako japam |
GV06avpray_u:3.6.98_11: iti hutvā mārjayitvā tato 'yam āgataḥ karmāṇi kuryāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.6.98_12-13: sa cet punar anuttha[ḥ] syāt tathā saṃsthitam evāsya tad agnihotraṃ bhavati
GV06avpray_u:3.6.98_13-14: jarāmaryaṃ vā etat sattraṃ yad agnihotram |
GV06avpray_u:3.7.98_14-16: atha ya āhitāgnir vipravasann agnibhiḥ pramīyeta kathaṃ tatra pātraviniyogaṃ pratīyāt | ity āhāśmarathyaḥ |
GV06avpray_u:3.7.98_17-18: yady anyāni pātrāṇi yajñāyudhānīty upasādya vihṛtyāgnim āhṛtya prajvālya vihareyur nirmathyam vā prajvālya viharet |
GV06avpray_u:3.7.98_19-20: ity etāvatāṅgaprabhṛtibhiḥ saṃsthāpyaivaṃ pātraviniyogam ity anuchādayet |
GV06avpray_u:3.7.98_20-21: yad yad utsannāḥ syur vāraṇīsahitāni pātrāṇīty apsu samāvapet |
GV06avpray_u:3.7.99_1-3: tayā me hy āroha tayā me hy āviśety aśmamayāni vā lohamayāni vā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradadyāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.7.99_5-6: adbhutāni prāyaścittāni vācākāṃ japam iti hutvā mārjayitvā tato yathāsukhacāriṇo bhavanti || 7 ||
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_6-9: atha yady enam anāhitāgnim iva vṛthāgninā daheyur evam asyaiṣa mṛtpātraviniyogeti patnya bhavatīty āhāśmarathyaḥ |
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_9-11: yadaiva kārmābhy adhvaryur vihitas tadaiva sarvakratūn praty āpado vihitāḥ | ity āhur ācāryāḥ |
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_11-13: atha katham asyām āpattau yathaiva śarīrādarśane vā samāmnātānām āpadāṃ kathaṃ tatra pātraviniyogaṃ pratīyād ity āhāśmarathyaḥ
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_14-16: araṇyor agnīn samāropya śarīrāṇām ardham ..... eṣā tūṣṇīṃ nirmathya prajvālya vihṛtya madhye 'gnīnām edhāṃś citvā darbhān saṃstīrya tatrāsya śarīrāṇi nidadhyuḥ |
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_17-18: yady agāthaḥ syād athāpy asāma kuryāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_18-20: śarīrādarśane pālāśatsarūṇy āhṛtyāthaitāni puruṣākṛtīni kṛtvā ghṛt[en]ābhyajya māṃsatvagasthy asya ghṛtaṃ ca bhavatīti ha vijñāyate | [ed. vi(r)jñā-]
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_20-22: yady āhavanīyo devalokaṃ yadi dakṣiṇāgniḥ pitṛlokaṃ yadi gārhapatyo mānuṣyalokaṃ |
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_22-23: yadi yugapat sarveṣv asya lokeṣv avaruddhaṃ bhavatīti ha vijñāyate |
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_23-25: tasmād yugapad eva sarvāṃt sādayitvātha yady enam an[v]ālabheta punar dahet |
GV06avpray_u:3.8.99_25-27: yat kiṃ cāvidhivihitaṃ karma kriyate tasyaiṣaiva sarvasya k;lptiḥ sarvasya prāyaścittiś ceti hi śrutir bhavati |
GV06avpray_u:3.8.100_2-4: yat kiṃcid yajñe viriṣṭam āpadyeta tasyaiṣaiva sarvasya k;lptiḥ sārvasya prāyaścittiś ca | iti hi śrutir bhavati || 8 ||
GV06avpray_u:3.9.100_5-7: pravṛtte tantre 'ntastantre vā gṛhapatir upatāpaḥ yasyāyur gṛhī[t]vānugacheḥ kāmaṃ tasya putraṃ bhrātaraṃ vopadīkṣya samāpnuyur |
GV06avpray_u:3.9.100_10-11: jīved ayam ahorātrāv ity ekāhāny (ekadvivāsavane) sarvāṇi savanāni samāveśayet |
GV06avpray_u:3.9.100_11-12: yasmiṃs tu samāveśayet tasya savanasya vaśam upayāntītarāṇi |
GV06avpray_u:3.9.100_12-14: savanāni nānātantrāṇi ced api bhavanti durgāpattau ca samāse veṣṭīnāṃ samāveśa[yed] vakṣyakāmaḥ |
GV06avpray_u:3.9.100_14-16: yāḥ kāś caikatantrā iṣṭaya[ḥ] syur avyavahitāḥ kāmaṃ tā ekatantre samāveśya haviṣām ānupūrvyeṇa pracaret |
GV06avpray_u:3.9.100_16-17: prāk sviṣṭakṛto mukhaṃ tu pañcājyāhutīr juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.9.100_17-18: agnaye somāya viṣṇava indrāgnibhyāṃ prajāpataya iti |
GV06avpray_u:3.9.100_18-20: yadi sauviṣtakṛtyā pracaranti khalu vai yadi bahūni vā sruveṇa yathāvadānenātikrāmet (AVPr_3.10:100/20) athātaḥ sa[t]triṇāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ |
GV06avpray_u:3.10.100_21-22: pravṛtte tantre saṃnaddhedhmābarhiṣi paścāc candramasaṃ paśyet |
GV06avpray_u:3.10.100_22-23: ya eṣāmā(mā)vāsyāyām āgneyaḥ puroḍāśas taṃ pāthikṛtaṃ karoti prakṛtyetaraṃ vinā |
GV06avpray_u:3.10.100_23-24: etad yajñaś chidyate ya etām antareṣṭiṃ tanvīta | iti hi śrutir bhavati |
GV06avpray_u:3.10.100-101_24-2: atha yasya paurṇamāsyaṃ (vā) vyāpadyeta kāmaṃ tatra prākṛtīḥ kuryāt
GV06avpray_u:3.10.101_2-3: tad ya[ḥ] kratur [dyāvākrato vā vāyo] vidyate 'tha nirvapati |
GV06avpray_u:3.10.101_3-4: āgneyam aṣṭākapālam aindram ekādaśakapālam āsādya havīṃṣi prāyaścittīr juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.10.101_4-6: yad udagān mahato mahimā asya māno asya jagataḥ pārthivasya mā naḥ prāpad duchunā kācid anyā | [ed. uchunā, cf. PS
GV06avpray_u:3.10.101_7-9: pari yajñasya bhojyasya bhojyavatkā mo ye kecit tatrasthāḥ paśavaḥ somakāriṇā teṣāṃ bhakṣabhakṣaṇaṃ |
GV06avpray_u:3.10.101_10-12: varāha-mārjā[ra]-māhiṣāṃ śakuno 'nyo 'vadānāni māṃsāni jāṃgalāni ca yady aśiṣaḥ syān māsi māsi ṣaḍḍhotāraṃ juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:3.10.101_12-19_0: sūryaṃ te cakṣur gacchatu vāto ātmānaṃ prāṇo dyāṃ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam ātmāṅgair yajñaṃ pṛthivīṃ śarīraiḥ vācaspate 'chidrayā
GV06avpray_u:3.10.101_12-19_1: vācāchidrayā juhvā devāvṛdhaṃ divi hotrām airayat svāheti ṣaḍḍhotāraṃ hutvā prajāpatiḥ sarvam evedam utsṛjet | iti hi śrutir
GV06avpray_u:3.10.101_12-19_2: bhavati ||10 || (ity atharvavede vaitānasūtre prāyaścittaprasaṃge ekādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ iti yajñaprāyaścitte tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ)
GV06avpray_u:4.1.101_20-21: (sānnāyyaṃ yad udbo)dhayeyuś ced vatsā vāyavyā(yā) yavāgvā sā[nnāy]yaṃ yajeta |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.102_1-2: adhītābhiḥ saṃsthāpya dhītānām vatsān apākṛtya śvaḥ sāṃnāyyena yajeta |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.102-103_2-2: sāyaṃ dohaṃ ced apahareyuḥ prātardohaṃ dvaidhaṃ kṛtvānyatarat sāyaṃdohasthāne kṛtvobhābhyāṃ yajeta |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.103_2-5: prātardohaṃ ced apahareyuḥ sāyaṃdohaṃ dvaidhaṃ kṛtvānyatarat prātardohasthāne kṛtvobhābhyāṃ yajeta |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.103_5-7: ubhau ced duṣyeyātām aindraṃ pañcaśarāvam odanaṃ nirupyāgneyena pracaryaindreṇānupracared uttarām upoṣya(to) v(ād)obhābhyāṃ yajeta |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.103-104_7-1: sarvāṇi ced dhavīṃṣy apahareyur duṣyeyur vājyena ca devatā yajeta |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.104_1-2: athānyām adoṣām iṣṭiṃ tanvītā(m | a)po duṣṭam abhyavahareyur |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.104_3-5: bhūtaṃ ced ājyaṃ skanded bhūpataye svāheti tribhir prādeśair diśo mimāya tad yajamāno devāñ janam agann ity anuṣaṅgaḥ |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.104-105_7-1: anutpūtaṃ ced ājyaṃ skanded vittaṃ prāṇaṃ dadyāt |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.105_1-4: tathotpūtam utpūyamānaṃ ced ghṛtaṃ dadyād athotpūtam utpūyamānaṃ ced ghṛtaṃ prāṇaṃ dadyād devatāntare ced ghṛtam |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.105_4-5: tvaṃ no agne | sa tvaṃ na | iti sarvaprāyaścittaṃ juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.105_6-8: <tvaṃ no agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḍo 'vayāsisīṣṭhāḥ | yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi pramumugdhy asmat [.RV 4.1.4]> ||
GV06avpray_u:4.1.105_8-10: <sa tvaṃ no agne 'vamo bhavotī nediṣṭho asyā uṣaṣo vyuṣṭau | ava yakṣva no varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhi mṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi svāhā [.RV 4.1.5]>_iti |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.105-106_10-2: devatāvadāne yājyānuvākyāvyatyāse 'nāmnātaprāyaścittānāṃ vā yady ṛkto 'bhy ābādhaḥ syād bhūr janad iti gārhapatye juhuyāt | [ed. -vyatyāsa]
GV06avpray_u:4.1.106_2: yadi yajuṣṭa oṃ bhuvo janad iti dakṣiṇāgnau juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.106_3: yadi sāmata oṃ svar janad ity āhavanīye juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.106_3-7_0: yady anājñātā brahmata om bhūr bhuvaḥ svar janad om ity āhavanīya eva juhuyād ājyabhāgānte sve devatām āvāhayiṣyan yasyai(va)
GV06avpray_u:4.1.106_3-7_1: havir niruptaṃ syāt tatontayā yajetājyasyaitāni nirupya |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.106_7-9: yadi bhāginīṃ nāvāhayed yatra smaret tatrainām upotthāyāvāhyāvāpasthāne yajeta |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.107_1-2: puroḍāśe du[ḥ]śrite sarpiṣy annaṃ catuḥśarāvam odanaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dadyāt
GV06avpray_u:4.1.107_4-5: puroḍāśe vikṣāme yato 'syākṣāmaḥ syāt tato yajeta | [ed. purodāṣe]
GV06avpray_u:4.1.108-109_2-2: <dhātā dadhātu pituḥ pitānaṣṭo gharmo viśvāyur yato jātas tato 'py avāṃ svāhā [cf. Mān;SS 3.1.24-25]>_iti juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.109_2-3: kapāle bhinne <gāyatryā tvā śatākṣarayā saṃdadhāmi [MS 1.4.13:62.19]>_iti saṃdhāya <dhātā dadhātu [see above]>_ity eva juhuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.109_4-5: āgneya[m] ekakapālaṃ nirvaped āśvinaṃ dvikapālaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ trikapālaṃ saumyaṃ catuḥkapālaṃ |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.109_5-8: naṣṭe bhinne ca bhārgavo hotā kīṭāvapannaṃ sānnāyyaṃ madhyamena parṇena <mahī dyauḥ [.RV 1.22.13]>_ity antaḥparidhideśe ninayet |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.109-110_8-1: <mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na imaṃ yajñaṃ mimikṣatāṃ | piprtāṃ no bharīmabhiḥ svāhā [.RV 1.22.13]>_iti |
GV06avpray_u:4.1.110-111_1-5_0: prāk prayājebhyo 'ṅgāraṃ barhisy adhiṣkanden <namas te astv āyate namo astu parāyate | namo yatra niṣīdasi [TB 3.7.2.7]>_ity
GV06avpray_u:4.1.110-111_1-5_1: abhimantrya_<āhaṃ yajñaṃ dadhe nirṛter upasthāt taṃ deveṣu paridadāmi vidvān | suprajās tvaṃ śataṃ hi māmadanta iha no devā
GV06avpray_u:4.1.111_5-7: <somānaṃ svaraṇaṃ kṛṇuhi brahmaṇaspate kakṣīvantaṃ ya auśijaḥ [.RV 1.18.1]>
GV06avpray_u:4.1.111_8-9: <ud uttamaṃ mumugdhi no vi pāśaṃ madhyamaṃ cṛta avādhamāni bādhata [cf. (AVPr_4.1:111/9-10) <ud uttamaṃ varuṇa [PS 18.82.6, ;SS 7.83.3/18.4.69]>_ity etābhir juhuyāt || 1 ||
GV06avpray_u:4.2.111_10-12: sarvāṇi ced āhutivelāyāṃ patny anālambhukā syāt tām aparudhya yajeta
GV06avpray_u:4.2.111-112_12-1: samāpyāmo 'ham asmi sā tvam iti tasyā dakṣiṇaṃ hastam anvālabhyopāhvayīta |
GV06avpray_u:4.2.112_1-3: āhutiś ced bahiṣparidhi skanded āgnīdhraṃ brūyuḥ saṃkrahiṣyāṃ tvā juhudhīti |
GV06avpray_u:4.2.112_4-6: puroḍāśaś ced adhiśrita udvijed utpated vā tam udvāsya barhiṣy āsādayet kim utpatasi kim utproṣṭhāḥ śāntaḥ śānter ihāgahi |
GV06avpray_u:4.2.112-113_6-1: aghoro yajñiyo bhūtvāsīda sadanaṃ svam āsīda sadanaṃ svam ||
GV06avpray_u:4.2.113_1-3: mā hiṃsīr deva preṣita ājyena tejasājyasva mā naḥ kiṃcana rīriṣo | yogakṣemasya śāntyā asmin āsīda barhir iti |
GV06avpray_u:4.2.113_3-4: taptaṃ cet karma (guṇo) tv antariyāt sarvaprāyaścittaṃ hutvā modvijet |
GV06avpray_u:4.2.113_4-6: (nāṅgāhutim antarhitāṃ dadyān | na ta-pa-varga-nimittābhāvāt pradhānalope 'ntarāye vā nirvaped vyāpadyeta) |
GV06avpray_u:4.2.113_6-7: śeṣ(ād avadyeṣ)aś ced vyāpadyetājyena sviṣṭakṛdiḍe samāpnuyāt |
GV06avpray_u:4.2.113_8-9: samāpte ced duṣṭo na kṛtām antarāṃ vā vidyāt punariṣṭir abhyāvarteta |
GV06avpray_u:4.3.113_10-11: agnyādheye samitsv āhitāsu nāgniṃ gṛhād uddhareyur nānyata āhareyur |
GV06avpray_u:4.3.113_11-13: yadi prayāyād anugached vā saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarābhiprāyo vā yadi tvared brahmaudanaṃ paktvā punaḥ samidham abhyādadhyāt |
GV06avpray_u:4.3.113_13-15: agnihotraṃ ced anabhyuddhṛtaṃ śaraśarāsyād amuṃ samūheti brūyāt |
GV06avpray_u:4.3.113_16-19: madhyamena parṇena <mahī dyaur [see above]> iti tan (madhyame palāśāvāṇaparṇena <mahī dyaur> iti tan mamadhyame palāśāvāṇaparṇena <mahī dyaur> ity) antaḥparidhideśe ninayet |

GV06avpray_u:6.9.143_22-24: ṛtvijāṃ ced duritam upākuryād agnaye rathantarāya svāhā | uṣase svāhā | paṅktaye svāhā | aśvibhyāṃ svāhā | <mā naḥ piparid aśvinā [cf. AVPariś 37.4.2]>_iti |
GV06avpray_u:6.9.143_24-27: sarvatrānājñāteṣv agnaye svāhā | yajñāya svāhā | brahmaṇe svāhā | viṣṇave svāhā | prajāpataye svāhā | anumataye svāhā | agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāheti |
GV06avpray_u:6.9.143_28-30: athaikāgnau yatra puroḍāśā uktā sthālīpākāṃs tatra kuryāt |
GV06avpray_u:6.9.143-144_30-2: sarvatra chedanabhedanāvadāraṇadahaneṣūkhāsu somakalaśamahāvīrayajñabhāṇḍeṣu sarvatra śīrṇe bhinne naṣṭe 'nyaṃ kṛtvā <punar maitv indriyam [see above]> ity ādadīta |
GV06avpray_u:6.9.144_2-4: sarvatra <mā no vidan [see above]>_ity abhayair aparājitair juhuyāt | abhayair aparājitair juhuyāt || 9 || ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GV06avpray_u:6.9.144_4-6: atha yatraitat pārthivam āntarikṣaṃ divyaṃ devair asurair yā prayuktaṃ tad adbhutaṃ śamayaty atharvā prabhur adbhutānāṃ |
GV06avpray_u:6.9.144_7-9: pṛthivyai śrotrāyāntarikṣāya prāṇāya vayobhyo dive cakṣuṣe nakṣatrebhyaḥ sūryāyādhipataye svāhā | iti sūtraprāyaścittis |
GV06avpray_u:6.9.144_11-12: prāyaścittānāṃ parimāṇaṃ na yajña upalabhyate | tasmād dṛṣṭaḥ samāso 'tra taṃ nibodhata yājñikāḥ |
